get.summary: A Release represents a single production run within a job or order. When a customer order (job) is divided into smaller, manageable quantities for production efficiency, called a Release. All Releases that have been scheduled & routed are synced/upserted from the QF-026 Master Schedule to this table. This will soon replace the master schedule entirely and pull directly from job sheet travelers/E2 in tandem with the jobs table.

post.summary: A Release represents a single production run within a job or order. When a customer order (job) is divided into smaller, manageable quantities for production efficiency, called a Release. All Releases that have been scheduled & routed are synced/upserted from the QF-026 Master Schedule to this table. This will soon replace the master schedule entirely and pull directly from job sheet travelers/E2 in tandem with the jobs table.

delete.summary: A Release represents a single production run within a job or order. When a customer order (job) is divided into smaller, manageable quantities for production efficiency, called a Release. All Releases that have been scheduled & routed are synced/upserted from the QF-026 Master Schedule to this table. This will soon replace the master schedule entirely and pull directly from job sheet travelers/E2 in tandem with the jobs table.

patch.summary: A Release represents a single production run within a job or order. When a customer order (job) is divided into smaller, manageable quantities for production efficiency, called a Release. All Releases that have been scheduled & routed are synced/upserted from the QF-026 Master Schedule to this table. This will soon replace the master schedule entirely and pull directly from job sheet travelers/E2 in tandem with the jobs table.
